name: Pine Ridge Trail
description: A scenic hike through the Ventana Wilderness with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and redwood groves.

name: Angel's Landing
description: A thrilling hike that features steep switchbacks and a narrow ridge with stunning panoramic views of Zion Canyon.

name: Mount Lafayette Loop
description: A challenging loop that takes you across the Franconia Ridge with incredible views of the White Mountains.

name: Cascade Canyon Trail
description: A serene trail offering incredible views of the Tetons, alpine lakes, and wildlife, including moose and bears.

name: Half Dome Trail
description: An iconic and strenuous hike that culminates in a climb up the famous Half Dome cables for sweeping views of Yosemite Valley.

name: Kalalau Trail
description: A stunning coastal hike along the Na Pali Coast, featuring remote beaches, lush valleys, and towering sea cliffs.

name: Bright Angel Trail
description: A popular trail that descends into the Grand Canyon, offering breathtaking views and access to the Colorado River.

name: Skyline Trail
description: A loop trail with close-up views of Mount Rainier, wildflower meadows, and occasional sightings of marmots and black bears.

name: Highline Trail
description: A picturesque trail that winds along the Garden Wall, with breathtaking views of Glacier's valleys, alpine meadows, and wildlife.

name: Teton Crest Trail
description: A multi-day backpacking trail that traverses the Teton Range, with stunning views of jagged peaks, alpine lakes, and wildflowers.
